xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 02 May 2013
xwikidoc.content: <froggy> has quit 03:24 <tishan> has joined #phenotips 03:30 <tishan> Hi 06:25 <sdumitriu> Hi 06:37 <sdumitriu> tishan: Ping 06:47 <tishan> has quit 07:06 <tishan> has joined #phenotips 07:39 <BogdanVancea> has quit 08:12 <sdumitriu> Hey tishan 08:23 <tishan> Hi 08:24 <tishan> Sorry. I enabled beeps in case you contact. Yet I did not hear you :) 08:33 <sdumitriu> Did you get my last email? 09:07 <tishan> Yes. I went through it. Ill also go through resources you provided 09:08 <tishan> So are we moving to a DVC just to facilitate those problems mentioned in problem statemment or is it a part on road map 09:13 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 09:15 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu: Hey 09:18 <sdumitriu> Hey kushalkhandelwal 09:19 <kushalkhandelwal> Morning :) 09:19 <sdumitriu> Been for a while 09:19 <kushalkhandelwal> What plans for the day ? 09:19 <kushalkhandelwal> In university ? 09:19 <sdumitriu> Implement imperial units for measurements 09:20 <sdumitriu> Not yet, about to leave 09:20 <kushalkhandelwal> Hmm 09:20 <kushalkhandelwal> Nice 09:20 <kushalkhandelwal> And I am onto Quantum Chemistry :D 09:20 <sdumitriu> tishan: Improving the versioning system has been on XWiki's roadmap for a long time, but implementing repeat visits is a top priority for PhenoTips 09:21 <kushalkhandelwal> Repeat Visits 09:21 <kushalkhandelwal> So that we can keep the history of all visits 09:22 <kushalkhandelwal> We discussed it once I guess 09:24 <tishan> sdumitriu:Ok. got it. So we should be able to show each visit uniquely(only changes made in that visit) or show changes of that visit merged in to previous records. I think it is the option 2 09:25 <sdumitriu> 2 09:25 <sdumitriu> I mean, each visit can be seen as a state, and that state has to reflect the full evaluation of the patient 09:25 <sdumitriu> But we must also be able to see how the patient evolves between visits 09:26 <sdumitriu> So we need to be able to diff any two visits 09:26 <sdumitriu> More complex, be able to see an animated timeline 09:26 <tishan> so you said the purpose of viewing last visit is either to edit it or add new test results 09:27 <kushalkhandelwal> Viewing last visit so that we can see the changes 09:27 <kushalkhandelwal> How the patient has progressed 09:27 <tishan> and it will be always done by the creator of that particular visit 09:27 <kushalkhandelwal> We should be able to see what are the current symptoms 09:27 <kushalkhandelwal> As in the current clinical findings 09:27 <kushalkhandelwal> Which might have changed 09:28 <kushalkhandelwal> tishan: Creator of that visit ? 09:28 <kushalkhandelwal> If a patient visits a department , he can be followed up by a different doctor in the department 09:29 <tishan> kushalkhandelwal: Rather reporter 09:29 <kushalkhandelwal> Anyone can add new findings 09:29 <kushalkhandelwal> which would be new reort in the history 09:29 <kushalkhandelwal> And when we compare the two visits we should be able to see what changed 09:29 <kushalkhandelwal> something like when you do " git diff " 09:29 <kushalkhandelwal> you see the change in your current branch 09:30 <kushalkhandelwal> and the previous one 09:30 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu: That would be correct ? 09:30 <tishan> kushalkhandelwal: yeah understand that :) 09:30 <kushalkhandelwal> :) 09:30 <kushalkhandelwal> tishan: You made your proposal ? 09:30 <kushalkhandelwal> Deadline is approaching fast 09:30 <kushalkhandelwal> I would suggest upload whatever you have made till now and keep changing till deadline 09:31 <kushalkhandelwal> Put a link to a google doc in your proposal 09:31 <kushalkhandelwal> which can be edited 09:31 <tishan> Ill compose it tonight. 09:31 <tishan> Yeah. Ill post it today and keep it editing 09:31 <kushalkhandelwal> :) 09:31 <tishan> thanks for the head up 09:31 <kushalkhandelwal> Anytime :) 09:32 <kushalkhandelwal> tishan: Which place ? 09:32 <tishan> It is always great to keep something editable after deadline 09:32 <tishan> last time I maintained a wiki 09:32 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes its good , so you can add some more content 09:33 <kushalkhandelwal> But I think it would be better if we make only minor changes and keep it close to what is on melange 09:33 <tishan> yeah. thats why I am trying to clear doubts and bring up a good proposal 09:37 <kushalkhandelwal> Yep , all the best 09:37 <sdumitriu> Yes, that is correct 09:37 <sdumitriu> Another feature is "stamp of approval" 09:38 <sdumitriu> Meaning that the head doctor (head as in chief, not as in doctor that looks at the head) can review the record and approve that all the data is correct 09:38 <sdumitriu> That would translate into a signed tag 09:39 <kushalkhandelwal> Hmm 09:39 <sdumitriu> Going to the lab, ttyl 09:39 <kushalkhandelwal> So we need a record review system 09:39 <kushalkhandelwal> Ok 09:39 <tishan> ok.cya 09:57 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 10:57 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: Hey 10:58 <sdumitriu1> Hey 10:58 <kushalkhandelwal> We were talking about the idea 10:58 <kushalkhandelwal> You were telling about stamp of approval 10:58 <sdumitriu1> Yep 10:59 <sdumitriu1> But that's a bit complex right now 10:59 <sdumitriu1> We need to wait for several changes in the XWiki platform 11:00 <kushalkhandelwal> Hm 11:00 <kushalkhandelwal> Will try my hands on XWiki this summer 11:01 <tishan> What is the xwiki version we are using. They recently release 5.0 11:01 <sdumitriu1> 4.5.3 11:02 <sdumitriu1> 5.0 final hasn't been released yet, might happen tomorrow 11:03 <kushalkhandelwal> Hmm 11:03 <kushalkhandelwal> We will upgrade ? 11:03 <tishan> is it? Just said coz I noticed a mail with subject line 5.0 release some days back. May be they hit some bugs then 11:04 <sdumitriu1> That was a thread about discussing the release 11:04 <sdumitriu1> There were some problems with the 5.0 development 11:05 <sdumitriu1> Some refactorings that were needed, but broke some features 11:05 <sdumitriu1> So the stabilization took longer than expected 11:05 <tishan> ok 11:06 <sdumitriu1> tishan: Do you know Asiri Rathnayake? 11:06 <tishan> sdumitri1: Yes. He taught OS module for us at University? How do you know him? 11:07 <sdumitriu1> Well, he was a GSoC student and then mentor for XWiki 11:07 <sdumitriu1> I'm the org admin for XWiki 11:09 <tishan> Ah.. I did not knew that. I also peeped into XWiki for this summer. But didnt find interesting deliverable idea 11:11 <tishan> sdumitriu1: So in this idea I have implement both backend and front end. 11:12 <sdumitriu1> Yes 11:12 <tishan> Ans also maintain a generic interface between two 11:12 <sdumitriu1> (I'm reading your email) 11:13 <tishan> Great. replying to that will be easy 11:19 <tishan> sdumitril: I will be afk for a while. out for dinner. 11:22 <sdumitriu1> Me too, meeting 11:55 <qwebirc28054> has quit 12:19 <mfiume> has quit 12:22 <mfiume1> has quit 12:23 <mfiume> is now known as <mfiume1> 12:23 <mfiume1> is now known as <mfiume> 13:51 <roque> has quit 13:52 <khodeir> has joined #phenotips 14:14 <khodeir> has quit 14:20 <phenotips_org> has joined #phenotips 15:21 <krinye> has quit 16:03 <tishan> sdumitriu1: Hi 16:03 <sdumitriu1> Hi 16:04 <tishan> Did you had time to read the mail 16:04 <sdumitriu1> Yes, but not to answer 16:05 <tishan> ok 16:05 <tishan> Still at university? 16:05 <sdumitriu1> Yes 16:05 <sdumitriu1> Let me answer quickly 16:05 <tishan> Its ok. take your time :) 16:18 <sdumitriu1> Sent 16:18 <tishan> Thanks I will take a look 16:26 <tishan> Hi 16:27 <tishan> sdumitriu1: Hi 16:29 <sdumitriu1> Hi again 16:29 <tishan> free enough to answer few more questions? :) 16:29 <sdumitriu1> Yes 16:30 <tishan> So the deliverable of this project would be 16:30 <tishan> 1. UI supporting multiple visits 16:30 <tishan> 2. redesigned backend API 16:31 <tishan> 3. versioning backend implementation 16:31 <sdumitriu1> Yes 16:32 <sdumitriu1> Are you good at UI design? 16:32 <sdumitriu1> How about frontend technologies: JS, CSS, HTML? 16:32 <tishan> I am good at it 16:32 <tishan> able to develop a UI 16:33 <sdumitriu1> OK 16:33 <tishan> recently I came across twitter bootstrap 16:33 <sdumitriu1> Anyway, you're not going to be alone 16:33 <tishan> its a nice way to design UIs 16:34 <tishan> http://twitter.github.io/bootstrap/ 16:34 <tishan> I s kushalkhandewall also doing this 16:35 <sdumitriu1> Well, I'm not sure that's needed 16:35 <sdumitriu1> You're going to have to integrate that into the existing UI of PhenoTips 16:35 <sdumitriu1> Switching to Bootstrap is a big project on its own 16:36 <tishan> yeah understood 16:39 <tishan> Still I could not figure out facilitating "no way of updating a previous visit" 16:40 <sdumitriu1> So, the way this works is: 16:40 <sdumitriu1> Creating a new patient = create a new git repo 16:40 <sdumitriu1> With onle one branch 16:40 <sdumitriu1> Updating = commit on the current branch 16:41 <sdumitriu1> Starting a new visit = create a new branch from the tip of the latest visit 16:41 <sdumitriu1> Opening a previous visit = switching to that branch 16:41 <sdumitriu1> Updating a previous visit = committing on that branch 16:42 <sdumitriu1> Got it? 16:43 <tishan> After updating a branch it should always merged to trunk 16:43 <tishan> yeah got it 16:43 <sdumitriu1> Yes, but not always 16:43 <sdumitriu1> It would be better to ask the user for confirmation 16:44 <tishan> yeah 16:45 <tishan> Should there be a functionality to search a given visit 16:46 <sdumitriu1> WDYM search? 16:47 <tishan> Doctor/nurse needs to find his/her previous visit in order to add some test results 16:48 <tishan> Since we cant show all visits of the history through that tab pane 16:48 <tishan> what is the mechanism there 16:48 <sdumitriu1> Hm, maybe 16:48 <sdumitriu1> But that's not a priority 16:49 <tishan> Assumption: Users will not update very old records. ;) 16:50 <sdumitriu1> Correct 16:50 <sdumitriu1> And I don't expect to have that many records... 16:52 <tishan> We have to use named branches with naming convention to facilitate switching to the relevant branch 16:52 <sdumitriu1> Yes 16:54 <tishan> We have to focus very much on backend API also. Much effort will be needed to design that 16:57 <tishan> btw I have some building issues 16:58 <sdumitriu1> What's wrong? 16:58 <tishan> build stop at Application interface 1.0 16:59 <tishan> it cant download jar lucene-analyzers-common/4.0.0/lucene-analyzers-common-4.0.0.jar 16:59 <tishan> I retried for several times 16:59 <sdumitriu1> Hm... 16:59 <tishan> tried -U 17:00 <tishan> it stops at the same spot 458 KB 17:00 <sdumitriu1> Checking 17:01 <sdumitriu1> Works for me 17:01 <tishan> I checked automated builds 17:01 <tishan> they are working also 17:02 <sdumitriu1> Could it be a limit on your internet connection? 17:02 <sdumitriu1> Can you manually download http://nexus.cs.toronto.edu/nexus/content/groups/public/org/apache/lucene/lucene-analyzers-common/4.0.0/lucene-analyzers-common-4.0.0.jar ? 17:02 <tishan> guessed that 17:02 <sdumitriu1> Or http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/org/apache/lucene/lucene-analyzers-common/4.0.0/lucene-analyzers-common-4.0.0.jar 17:04 <tishan> I think it is some connection issue coz I could not even download M5 pack 17:05 <sdumitriu1> The second link doesn't work either? 17:05 <tishan> but I can download content from other places. Morning I downloaded a video of 200MB. 17:05 <krinye> has quit 17:05 <BogdanVancea> has quit 17:06 <tishan> waiting on second link 17:07 <tishan> It is also halted at the same place. 410 KB 17:07 <sdumitriu1> I can download from Europe as well, so it's definitely on your side 17:08 <tishan> :( 17:09 <tishan> I checked with reconnected connection, restarted machine 17:09 <tishan> Ill try to check with an ADSL connection tommorow 17:10 <vshivam> has quit 17:10 <krinye> has quit 17:12 <tishan> I am gonna go out now. Its around 3 am here 17:13 <tishan> I'll compose a proposal by the time you wake tomorrow 17:17 <sdumitriu1> OK 17:17 <sdumitriu1> Have a good night 17:17 <tishan> Good evening for you I suppose :) 17:21 <tishan> has quit 18:08 <sdumitriu1> has quit 20:22 <phenotips_org> has joined #phenotips 20:22 <kushalkhandelwal> Done with imperial units ? 20:22 <sdumitriu> Good morning 20:22 <sdumitriu> Nope, not a single line of code today... 20:23 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh 20:23 <kushalkhandelwal> why so ? 20:24 <sdumitriu> Students, meetings... 20:25 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh 20:26 <kushalkhandelwal> I slept early last night :\ 20:27 <kushalkhandelwal> Slept while studying 20:27 <kushalkhandelwal> on my desk :P 20:27 <kushalkhandelwal> Couldn't work on any issue 20:29 <kushalkhandelwal> Few hours more for application 20:29 <kushalkhandelwal> Should I remove my personal details from application ?? My address and phone no ? 20:30 <sdumitriu> No 20:34 <kushalkhandelwal> Ok 22:01 <Krinye> has quit 22:09 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 22:37 <ravigarg27> has quit 23:08 <Natasha> has joined #phenotips 23:23 <sdumitriu> Hey Natasha 23:26 <Natasha> Hi Sergiu 23:26 <Natasha> are there any news ? 23:26 <sdumitriu> Sorry for delaying with that email 23:26 <sdumitriu> We've all been terribly busy 23:27 <Natasha> It is fine ... I understand 23:27 <sdumitriu> Unfortunately our collaborators don't have any projects 23:27 <Natasha> But the deadline for the application is tomorrow noon 23:27 <sdumitriu> Yes, I'll let you edit it after that for a few days 23:27 <Natasha> So Phenotips won't be part od GSoC 2013 ? 23:27 <sdumitriu> It is 23:29 <sdumitriu> So, you're OK with the "Real-time collection of clinical data on patients with genetic disorders using various medical ontologies" project? 23:30 <Natasha> Yes I am, and I would like to work on if it is ok with you 23:30 <sdumitriu> Sure 23:30 <Natasha> so the current ontology should be extended with ICD-10 ? 23:30 <Natasha> are there any parts of the project that should be fulfilled ? 23:31 <Natasha> Can I write timeline according to the description given about the project, and send it to you, so you can check ? 23:31 <sdumitriu> Yes 23:31 <Natasha> should this timeline be permanent, or we can change it afterwards ? 23:31 <sdumitriu> It will definitely change 23:32 <Natasha> ok 23:32 <sdumitriu> I mean, nothing ever goes exactly as planned 23:32 <Natasha> and whom should I send my application ? 23:32 <sdumitriu> Through http://www.google-melange.com/gsoc/homepage/google/gsoc2013 23:33 <Natasha> yes, that is true, but it is a part from the application I have to fulfill 23:33 <Natasha> thank you 23:33 <Natasha> then, I will add that part, and I will try to send you the application later tonight, so you can check tomorrow morning if that is ok with you 23:34 <sdumitriu> Yes 23:34 <Natasha> do you have any suggestions about the application ? 23:34 <Natasha> are there any things it is good for me to mention ? 23:34 <sdumitriu> Well, the more details there are in the architecture and timeline, the better 23:35 <sdumitriu> Oh, about the empty database 23:35 <Natasha> yes ? 23:35 <sdumitriu> You're supposed to log in with: 23:35 <sdumitriu> username: Admin 23:35 <sdumitriu> password: admin 23:35 <sdumitriu> (both case sensitive) 23:35 <Natasha> thank you 23:35 <Natasha> i will try them 23:36 <Natasha> i don't want to bother you anymore 23:36 <Natasha> i will finish the application and send it to you 23:36 <sdumitriu> Don't worry, you're not bothering me 23:36 <sdumitriu> It's my fault for keeping you waiting 23:36 <Natasha> don't worry about that 23:36 <Natasha> is there a way how can I help ? 23:37 <Natasha> with some ideas, or to read about some other ontologies or impelemntations ? 23:37 <sdumitriu> Well, part of the selection will be to fix one or two easy issues from https://github.com/compbio-UofT/phenotips/issues?labels=easy 23:37 <sdumitriu> But you'll need my help 23:38 <sdumitriu> Are you busy in the following days? 23:38 <sdumitriu> Any exams left? 23:38 <Natasha> one more tomorrow, but afterwards I am available 23:38 <Natasha> my summer break starts :) 23:39 <sdumitriu> OK, good 23:39 <sdumitriu> You should hang around the channel more after the exam 23:39 <Natasha> I am sorry I didn't was online this week, but I had some issues with MIRC 23:39 <Natasha> yes, now I will be online more often 23:39 <sdumitriu> OK, it's late, I'm going to sleep 23:40 <Natasha> so, please, just let me know when you have time so you can help me to start 23:40 <sdumitriu> Yep 23:40 <Natasha> ok 23:40 <Natasha> good night then :) 23:40 <sdumitriu> https://github.com/compbio-UofT/phenotips/tree/master/components/solr-access-service is the current component that deals with searching the ontologies 23:40 <sdumitriu> Pluggin into https://github.com/compbio-UofT/phenotips/tree/master/resources/solr-configuration 23:41 <Natasha> ok 23:41 <sdumitriu> Good night 23:41 <Natasha> i will give a look today 23:41 <Natasha> thank you 23:41 <Natasha> good night
